name: HanRunSmartHome
0:
”alexa,turn on the light”
”alexa,turn off the light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Hanrun lighting, light up the smart life
Hanrun is a professional LED manufacturer with more than 10-year experience. Users can experience smart lighting with Hanrun App to control ceiling lights, down lights, light strip, etc.
1. Work with popular smart home assistant in the market
2. Full house lighting control with one App
3. Timer, customized models
4. Easy connection with multiple devices
